\dAlrighty, food's ready!\d%K%P
A few hours had passed since Yukari had declared\nherself my new wife.%K%P
The whole ordeal had me uneasy, but so far my\nfears seemed unmerited.%K%P
\dWow, this looks great.\d%K%P
\dThere's plenty to go round, so eat up.\d%K%P
Our 'marriage' was only supposed to be a temporary\narrangement, but her face was beaming with\nhappiness nonetheless.%K%P
\dIs uhh, watching someone eat really that\nexciting?\d%K%P
\dOh, you don't even know!\d%K%P
\dWatching you enjoy the food I've made for you,\nseeing it nourish you... Oh my, I can think of\nnothing more wonderful!\d%K%P
\dNourish me...\d%K%P
I stared at the food in front of me.%K%P
\dC-Come on now, I didn't put anything weird in it!\d%K%P
\dI just added an extra serving of love to it!\d%K%P
\dRight...thanks.\d%K%P
\dOh, you are quite welcome!\d%K%P
Maybe it had a bit too much love in it, but other\nthan that it seemed fine.%K%P
She might be a Tatarigami, but she also made an\nexcellent cook.%K%P
\dOh my, look at how you stare at me!\d%K%P
\dWhat? No, I wasn't staring.\d%K%P
\dOh no, don't worry. I get it. Your eyes just can't\nhelp but be transfixed by me...\d%K%P
\dThey speak to just how much you desire your\nbeloved wife, yes?\d%K%P
She had a tendency to explain things in her own\npeculiar way, but that was about the only problem\nwith her.%K%P
\dHehehe! I can sense the sincerity of your love for\nme.\d%K%P
\dI love you too, of course! And I will serve you as\nyour faithful wife.\d%K%P
I'd been worried about how life with Yukari would\nbe, but so far it didn't seem like it would be so\nhard after all.%K%P
At least, I hoped as much.%K%P
--Later that night.%K%P
Like always, I slept on a futon laid out in the\nmain hall. I had set Yukari up in the guest\nquarters.%K%P
\dI was sure she was going to give me a hard time\nabout it.\d%K%P
I expected her to be all 'A husband and wife should\nsleep together!' or something.%K%P
But mercifully she'd gone to her own quarters\nwithout a word of complaint.%K%P
\dShe didn't even barge in on me in the shower.\d%K%P
I had definitely thought she'd come in saying 'Let\nme scrub your back for you!' But she had let me\nhave my shower alone in peace.%K%P
I started feeling dumb for even worrying in the\nfirst place.%K%P
\dGuess I'll just go to sleep, then...\d%K%P
Working at a shrine meant early mornings, so I\ndecided to quit fretting and just get some rest.%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
Human bonds are built on trust. Yes, yes, even a\nGoddess like me has heard that.%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
I had pulled off the spitting image of what Akira\nmight look for in a wife, if I do say so myself!%K%P
\dAnd now I've stolen his trust! Oh what a cutie,\nthat Akira!\d%K%P
It was almost too easy. But I guess that's just\nproof of how pure he is.%K%P
Brought up on holy grounds, that pure, untouched\nSakimitama of his had never known the vile truths\nof the world.%K%P
\dI've done my best to constrain myself, but enough\nis enough. I can't hold my Tatari back anymore...\d%K%P
\dI just want to lick up that Sakimitama of his...\nLick it up and smooch it and...\d%K%P
\dThat should be fine, right? No problem? I am his\nwife after all, yes? Yes I am!\d%K%P
\dHis wife! His wife! His lovely wedded wife! Me!\nAkira's adorable little wife!\d%K%P
\dThat gives me every right to lick him right up, oh\nyes. I am his wife after all! Yes, and that is the\nright of any wife!\d%K%P
\dYour sweet Yukari is coming for you. Coming to\nhandle your nightly needs!\d%K%P
\d...Mmmnh?\d%K%P
Something or other pulled me out of my slumber.%K%P
It felt like something was weighing down on me in\nmy sleep.%K%P
\dMmm, so cute, even fast asleep!\d%K%P
\dNow then! Time to fulfill my wifely duties! A\nlittle licky-licky and some smoochy-smoochy!\d%K%P
Something soft was pressed against me, making\nsmooching sounds...%K%P
Then something tickled me...%K%P
\dWh-What are you doing?!\d%K%P
As I opened my eyes, the first thing I saw was\nYukari, there right in front of me.%K%P
\dOh! Hey sleepyhead. Up already?\d%K%P
\dHow could I sleep while you're doing that?!\d%K%P
Yukari was straddled on top of me, looking down.%K%P
In the darkness of the room I could see the glint\nin her eyes, like a predator stalking its prey.%K%P
\dWhat were you just doing?\d%K%P
\dOh my! You shouldn't force a girl to say such\nthings!\d%K%P
\dNo, seriously, I need an answer.\d%K%P
\dI was only licking a bit! Just a tad! The real\nthing starts from here, don't you worry!\d%K%P
I had been a little already, but now I was really\nstarting to worry.%K%P
\dIt's just like I thought. I've never seen\nSakimitama as pure as yours...\d%K%P
\dJust its touch is so intense... I can hardly\ncontain my Tatari...\d%K%P
\dYou don't mind, right? You're ready to accept\nevery last bit of me, yeah?\d%K%P
\dThe more I love someone, the more I am bound to\nhurt them. But you, Akira Manase, you are the only\none who can take me as I am.\d%K%P
\dYou are the only one who can handle my Tatari...\nAnd that's why... That's why I...\d%K%P
\dYukari...\d%K%P
I understood where her love arose from.%K%P
It was the kind of feeling only a Tatarigami could\npossess. Always having to flee those they love.\nAlways being alone.%K%P
How many times had she suffered through as much?\nThe thought alone tore my heart apart.%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
\dThis is okay, right? Because I'm your wife and\nall, I have certain rights, yeah?\d%K%P
\dWell then I claim rights to your virginity!\d%K%P
\dNow just hold it right there!!!\d%K%P
\dWho dares disturb the sanctity of a husband and\nwife's first night...?\d%K%P
\dAkira, it's me. Thank goodness I made it in time.\d%K%P
\dKaede!\d%K%P
Out of thin air a figure appeared aside us. It was\nKaede, the Goddess enshrined here at Kamimori\nShrine.%K%P
She had assisted my family in both formal and\nprivate affairs for the past six years. She was the\nshrine's deity and the Goddess I was closest to.%K%P
\dNow then, Akira, who is this questionable girl\nhere, exactly? I would just love for you to explain\nthis all to me.\d%K%P
\dWell, you see, it's a long story really, but this\nis Yukari Amatsu. She's a Tatarigami.\d%K%P
\dI'm Akira's wife! His wife, you hear?\d%K%P
\dWell, it seems to me one of you wanted this more\nthan the other.\d%K%P
\dHehehe, he's just playing shy. He'll come around\neventually. You'll see...\d%K%P
\dNow then, my Akira. Shall we? I think it's time I\nrid you of that virginity you've clung on to for so\nlong...\d%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
Her arms were as slender as any other girl's, but\nher grip was so strong I couldn't budge. Maybe it\nwas her divine powers or something.%K%P
She didn't feel heavy, but for some reason I\ncouldn't pull myself out from underneath her.%K%P
I was in serious trouble now...%K%P
\dNow just relax. This won't hurt. Just the\nopposite, actually! And afterwards you'll be a real\nman!\d%K%P
\dHa! Oh, you silly little girl.\d%K%P
\dWhat's so funny?\d%K%P
\dIt's just, you're fantasizing about the\nimpossible.\d%K%P
\dHe's not even a virgin.\d%K%P
\dI have made sure of that myself!\d%K%P
\dWhat?!\d%K%P
The spirit was sucked right out of her.%K%P
\dThat's not... No way! Not his sweet, precious\nvirginity... To the likes of a hag like you...?\d%K%P
\dOh Akira! Tell me it isn't true! You've already\nbeen made a man?\d%K%P
\dAh, well, you see...\d%K%P
\dNo way! You won't even deny it? So it is true?\nThis can't be!\d%K%P
\dThat's what you get for going around proclaiming\nyourself as his wife. Now then Akira, come here.\d%K%P
I couldn't budge Yukari a moment ago, but all of a\nsudden she was as light as a feather.%K%P
While she remained dazed I lifted her off me and\nfled to Kaede's side.%K%P
\dAre you all right sweetie? She didn't pull\nanything, did she? I know you're immune to Tatari,\nbut I was beside myself with worry.\d%K%P
\dNo, I...don't think so...\d%K%P
Truth was I had felt something.%K%P
She had said she'd been 'licking' too...%K%P
\dYour Sakimitama seems unmarked. But...oh yes, I\nsense something is a bit off.\d%K%P
\dCome on over here, Akira. I'll get you cleaned\nright up!\d%K%P
\dMwah!\d%K%P
\dHuhh?!\d%K%P
Kaede suddenly took my lips with hers.%K%P
This was her way of 'cleaning' me up?!%K%P
\dAnd j-j-just what are you trying to pull?! That's\nmy husband you know!\d%K%P
\dSays who? How dare you force your way into this\nplace and onto him...\d%K%P
\dHow could you! His first kiss, too...\d%K%P
\dSorry, I'd already claimed that, too.\d%K%P
\dNghaaa!\d%K%P
She had finally lost it.%K%P
\dI still haven't tasted those lips! I was saving\nthem for dessert!\d%K%P
\dSo terribly sorry, dear. But Akira here is all\nmine.\d%K%P
*smooch!*%K%P
Kaede made sure Yukari could see it this time.%K%P
\dThere we are. Nice and clean.\d%K%P
\dKaede...s-suddenly...k-kiss?\d%K%P
\dSorry sweetheart. Are you mad...?\d%K%P
\dNo, not at all, I just...\d%K%P
\dGood then. I would hate to trouble you.\d%K%P
Kaede looked like she only gave the whole situation\na thought after the fact, and was starting to feel\nembarrassed by it.%K%P
\dWhat about you, though? You sure you wanted to\nkiss the likes of me?\d%K%P
\dOf course! Want me to do it some more to prove\nit?\d%K%P
\dYou're all cleaned up already, so next time it\nwould just be for fun...\d%K%P
I don't know if it was Yukari who set her off, but\nsomething had clicked inside Kaede. It was as if a\nswitch had been activated inside her.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
She looked at me with teary eyes, and drew me in\nclose.%K%P
She pressed her lips, still wet from our last kiss,\ninto mine.%K%P
\dI'm the one that loves you... Watching that girl\ntry to take you from me, I just...\d%K%P
\dHow dare you...\d%K%P
\dHow dare you how dare you how dare you! I'm his\nwife! We are bound for life!\d%K%P
\dYou and your 'feelings' for him are nothing but a\nnuisance.\d%K%P
\dThat's not true! It's not! Nope nope nope!\d%K%P
\dMy Akira, he accepted me! He took me as his wife!\nHe's my one and only, my dearest husband!\d%K%P
\dYou'll pay for this...!\d%K%P
Darkness began flowing out from within Yukari.%K%P
The air was dense with her Jinriki, and it was\ntaking shape as Tatari.%K%P
\dAre you trying to threaten me?\d%K%P
\dI'm sorry sweetie. Kaede Shizumori is not one to\nfeel threatened by some lowly Tatari like yours. I\nam of a much higher divinity than that.\d%K%P
\dNow behold the Jinriki power of a reformed\nTatarigami!\d%K%P
The Tatari grew yet larger and headed towards\nKaede.%K%P
But a pure whiteness surrounded Kaede.%K%P
\dBehold the power of the new me... I will not let\nyour Tatari pollute these Kamimori lands...\d%K%P
\dB-But how...?\d%K%P
Yukari's Tatari collided with Kaede's power.%K%P
They canceled each other out and the blasts\ndissipated into thin air.%K%P
\dWell? Is that all you've got?\d%K%P
\dShut up! Don't you doubt a wife's real power!\d%K%P
\dYour 'wife power' is Tatari, then? Don't make me\nlaugh!\d %K%P
\dIf you want to claim him as your husband, then why\ndon't we compete at something more apt?\d%K%P
\dFine! I have everything it takes to be the perfect\nwife!\d%K%P
\dIs that so? By all means, tell me what it is\nyou've got!\d%K%P
The two Goddesses were locked in an increasingly\nheated battle.%K%P
At least it had changed from a battle of Jinriki to\none of boasts and brags, but it was easily just as\nscary.%K%P
\dAki, this way!\d%K%P
\dShion? You're here too...?\d%K%P
The girl who latched on to my hand was Shion\nMisono. Another Goddess I had known for a while.%K%P
She was a Goddess of Misfortune who came here\nseeking salvation, a lot like Yukari.%K%P
These days she had a more positive air about her,\nbut she had once been even more dangerous than\nYukari.%K%P
\dKaede had sensed a strange Jinriki, so she came to\ninvestigate. So I just sorta followed her here,\nthen...\d%K%P
And now here we were.%K%P
Kaede had arrived to save me from Yukari creeping\nup in the night, and now the two were locked in a\nbattle of words.%K%P
\dYou do not want to get caught up in that. Let's\nkeep our distance.\d%K%P
Shion led me away to safety, out to the reception\nhall.%K%P
Yukari and Kaede were too busy fighting to even\nnotice us.%K%P
\dI'm his wife! His wife, you hear me?!\d%K%P
\dYou think being able to do a few chores makes you\nwife material? I've got that down pat, plus I know\nevery last thing about Akira.\d%K%P
\dI'm only just starting! I'll get there someday!\d%K%P
\dI'm telling you, you won't!\d%K%P
\dYou keep calling yourself his wife but you've\nnever even thought about how he feels...\d%K%P
\dMe, on the other hand, I have that covered. I\nwould be a far more suitable choice as Akira's\nbetter half.\d%K%P
\dNot if I have anything to say about it!\d%K%P
\dI could say the same to you!\d%K%P
They spat back and forth, tit for tat, and the\nsituation continued to escalate.%K%P
They were fighting only with words, but who knew\nhow long that would last.%K%P
\dListen to them getting all worked up.\d%K%P
\dIt's not a pretty sight, that's for sure. And they\ndon't even realize what a pain they're being to\nyou. Idiots.\d%K%P
\dYou don't call either of them your wife, or your\n'better half' or whatever, but still they blabber\non. What a bunch of kids.\d%K%P
Shion was way more relaxed than the other two. She\ncould be troublesome and self-indulgent, but she\nwas level-headed at times like these.%K%P
\dYou're way easier to chill with.\d%K%P
\dWhat's that supposed to mean? You picking on me,\nAki?\d%K%P
\dWhat? No. Are you worried?\d%K%P
\dWould it be bad if I was...?\d%K%P
\dNo, no. I mean, It's not like I don't like you.\d%K%P
\dWhoa now, killer. You trying to sweet-talk me?\d%K%P
\dJeez, no.\d%K%P
\dCome on, I'm playing! You go all out with Kaede,\nbut this is what I get, huh?\d%K%P
\dOkay, well... See, that was...\d%K%P
It was just one time, but Kaede and I had gotten\nclose once before.%K%P
It turned out to be a bad decision however, and we\nhad never really got along the same afterwards.%K%P
\dHey, I get it.\d%K%P
\dBut I like you too, you know...\d%K%P
\dShion...?\d%K%P
\dIf Yukari's claimed the position as your wife, and\nKaede's your better half, that leaves me as...your\nmistress, maybe?\d%K%P
\dWhaddaya think, Aki? Will you take me as your\nmistress?\d%K%P
\dI mean, why not just give me a try...yeah?\d%K%P
And just like that she had her arms around me.%K%P
She had a small frame, way shorter than me, but she\nheld me against her.%K%P
\dAhaha... Look at me, hugging you...\d%K%P
\dJeez, what am I doing? But if I'm going to be your\nmistress I need to do at least this much...\d%K%P
None of this was like her at all. I could sense how\nmuch courage she was mustering up to do this.%K%P
I'd never realized how much she had longed for me.%K%P
\dSo? Not a bad hug, right?\d%K%P
\dHmm, well...for what there is...\d%K%P
\dYou callin' me small?!\d%K%P
\dThat's not what I said.\d%K%P
She was small, but that wasn't to say she lacked\nfeminine features.%K%P
As she latched on to me, her womanliness\nelectrified me.%K%P
\dFine, whatever. You just don't see me that way\nbecause I don't have the bust she does.\d%K%P
\dNo, that's not true...\d%K%P
\dHmmm?\d%K%P
She might not have realized it, but when she\npressed herself into me, my mind definitely went\nracing.%K%P
\dAre you...? Does that mean...? Do I turn you on?\d%K%P
\dHey, come on! You don't need to say it like that.\d%K%P
\dHey! That's not a fair answer... C'mon, don't go\nembarrassing me, jeez!\d%K%P
\dAh, whatever. I'll take it. As your mistress I'll\ntake everything you throw at me.\d%K%P
For some reason she seemed set on the idea, and\nentrusted her body to me.%K%P
\dGo ahead, Aki. Kaede was your first, but so what?\nIt doesn't bother me...\d%K%P
\dMmmn...\d%K%P
She puckered up her lips, waiting for a kiss.%K%P
\dShion...\d%K%P
\dC'mon. Give me my first kiss...\d%K%P
So she had never even kissed anyone before?%K%P
\dAnd just WHAT do you think you're doing, Akira?\d%K%P
\dYukari...\d%K%P
I turned to find Yukari with a fierce look of\nwomanly rage on her face.%K%P
\dHehehe, thought you could cheat on me, did you?\nWhat if you caught something nasty?\d%K%P
\dWhat?! I'm not dirty!\d%K%P
\dShion, how could you...\d%K%P
\dCould you stop it with that face...?\d%K%P
Kaede's face was grinning but her eyes lacked any\nsuch emotion.%K%P
They screamed for payback.%K%P
\dTo think little old Shion would sneak her way into\nthis as Akira's mistress... Well played...\d%K%P
\dTime for a serving of the black! Drink up!\d%K%P
Huh? Suddenly Yukari had a cup in her hand? And it\nwas full of some horrid black something-or-other?!%K%P
\dOne serving of black coffee!\d%K%P
\dWhat?! No way that's coffee! More like 100\p\nTatari juice!\d%K%P
\dHehehe, nonsense! It's full of healthy vitamins and\nminerals!\d%K%P
\dYou're the one who wants to grow up. Don't worry,\nI'll stop things before they get too out of hand.\nNow, bottoms up!\d%K%P
\dWhat? Are you--?! Wait, no! Stop...!\d%K%P
\dNghaaa!!!\d%K%P
To cut a long story short, the black liquid forced\ndown Shion's throat was...regular old black coffee.%K%P
But Shion absolutely hated coffee, so it worked out\nto be just as much of a punishment as anything she\ncould imagine.%K%P
